overview: After joining the Zorpia team as a Site Administrator in 2007, Hope quickly proved her worth as an enthusiastic team member during the Human Z project. Hope enjoys a challenge, and on this occasion was able to get more than 1200 people stand in the shape of a ‘Z’ for Zorpia. In her role as Music Promotions and Events Coordinator, she used her adventurous and eager spirit, as well as her ability for good judgement and foresight, lead her to get into the Events and Media-relations management.
